en-US.LoginId_Tip: Login id should have 6-10 alphabets with at least one numeric value, No special Characters
en-US.Password_Tip: Password should have 6-15 characters with at least one number, one lower case character, one upper case character, allowed special characters are <>"%()&+\'
en-US.Select_Security_Answer: Enter enter answer to security Question
en-US.Loan_Account_Tip: Your Loan Account number is printed on your Loan documents
en-US.Account_Number_Tip: Please enter the 11 digit savings account number found in your cheque book
en-US.Card_Tip: Please enter the 16 digit debit card number printed on your debit card
en-US.UCIC_Tip: Your Customer ID is a 10 digit unique reference number found in your welcome kit
en-US.Expiry_Tip: Please provide Year and Month of Expiration of your card
en-US.CVV_Tip: Please provide CVV number at the back of your card
en-US.Note: Please select any of the following options
en-US.Error_UCIC_Pattern: Please enter a valid Customer ID.
en-US.Error_Account_Pattern: Please enter a valid account number.
en-US.Error_Loan_Account_Length: Account Number should be of 14 digits.
en-US.Error_Account_Invalid: You have entered a wrong Account Number. Please check and enter the right one.
en-US.Error_Loan_Account_Invalid: You have entered a wrong Loan Account Number. Please check and enter the right one.
en-US.Error_CardNumber_Pattern: Please enter a valid 16 digit Card number.
en-US.Error_CardNumber_Invalid: Are you sure you are looking at your IDFC debit card ? Some of the details seem wrong...
en-US.Error_ExpiryMonth_Invalid: Please enter a valid Expiry Month.
en-US.Error_ExpiryMonth_MaxLength: Month should not be more than be 2 digit
en-US.Error_ExpiryYear_Invalid: Please enter a valid Expiry Year.
en-US.Error_ExpiryYear_MaxLength: Year should not be more than be 2 digit
en-US.Error_LoanAccount_Pattern: Please enter a valid loan account number.
en-US.Error_LoginId_MaxLength: Login Id should not be more than 10 characters
en-US.Error_LoginId_Format: Login ID does not match the requested format.
en-US.Error_Password_MaxLength: Password length should not be more than 15 characters.
en-US.Error_Password_Pattern: Password does not match the requested format.
en-US.Error_Password_Invalid: Password should not contain Login Id.
en-US.OTP_Tip: Please enter the 6 digit OTP we sent to your registered mobile number
en-US.Success_Msg: Your Login ID has been retrieved and sent to your registered Email ID.
en-US.Success_Msg4: sent the same to your Email ID.
en-US.Tip_OTP: Please enter the 6 digit OTP we sent to your registered mobile number
